short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Interactive Reading Assistant Tool for Filipino Short Stories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension that serves as an reading assistant tool for dyslexic students in comprehending Filipino short stories and improving Filipino language acquisition. The web extension will utilize existing tools for dyslexic reading assistance, such as text-to-speech, font modification and word highlighting. Additionally, the web extension will incorporate machine learning techniques, namely named entity recognition (NER) and part of speech (POS) tagging, to identify and explain important words and phrases in the stories
